title: Brek
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Self-serve buffet style, pay at a cashier before you eat. There is a vegetables and whole grains section that is all vegan with  micro-greens, beans, corn, carrots, beets, other veggies, quinoa, and farro. There is also fresh fruit and other vegetarian and fish dishes.
